snippet.title: Andro Dunos 2 Launch Trailer | PixelHeart
snippet.description:
🚀 👾 👽  The sequel to the famous shoot'em up from Visco studio is coming to PixelHeart. It's time to bring out your good old spaceship fighter in ANDRO DUNOS 2.
Once upon a time...
Andro Dunos (アンドロデュノス, in japanese) is a side scrolling arcade game from shoot’em up category (Shmup).
Developed by Visco and Distributed in 1992 by SNK ON Neo-Geo MVS and Neo-Geo AES. 🚀 👾 👽

Physical release scheduled 2021. (This game is in pre-order.)

Andro Dunos II Switch (PEGI 7 - ESRB 7)
💳PHYSICAL VERSION Available here:
➡️Standard Edition: https://bit.ly/31dOqr7
➡️Limited Edition: https://bit.ly/3tPmeXJ
➡️MVS Edition: https://bit.ly/3rfhPvz

Andro Dunos II PS4 (PEGI 7).
💳PHYSICAL VERSION Available here: 
➡️Standard Edition: https://bit.ly/3shTiYb
➡️Limited Edition: https://bit.ly/2QBepXu
➡️MVS Edition: https://bit.ly/3f8y77d

Andro Dunos II Xbox One (PEGI 7).
💳PHYSICAL VERSION Available here: 
➡️Standard Edition: ​https://bit.ly/2Pp7NL2

#AndroDunos #Shmup  #Retrogaming #shootemup #Shooter #AndroDunos2 #Visco #PixelHeart #Joshprod #NintendoSwitch​ #Nintendo​ #PS4​ #Playstation4​ #XboxOne​ #PixelArt​ #Storybird​​ #JustForGames

Creation by Picorinne soft., PixelHeart
Producer: PixelHeart
Publisher: https://www.pixelheart.eu and Just For Games
Digital Version Publisher: 
OST by Allister Brimble (Alien Breed, Body Blows, Project-X, Colonization, Driver or Superfrog).
